description: on the right half of the image is a man in a coat holding a hat in one hand and raising the other to chest level; on the left half of the image is a staircase leading to a closed door; the figure is colored in dark green ink and the space behind him and on the far left is light green ink
inscription: LL margin of sheet, in pencil: E.148-II | LRC of sheet, in pencil: Probedruck | LLC of sheet in pencil, on verso: 1908
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 23 / E. | LLC of sheet, in pencil: Mann vor der Tür.
title: Man in Front of the Door
